targets.query:
from(bucket: "stat-prod")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "stat")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["unit"] == "review")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["status"] == "ready")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "count")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "poi")
  |> drop(columns: ["visibility", "status", "unit"])
  |> window(every: 5m)
  |> sum()
  |> duplicate(column: "_stop", as: "_time")
  |> window(every: inf)
  |> yield()

from(bucket: "stat-prod")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "stat")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["unit"] == "review")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["status"] == "ready")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "count")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "kitchen")
  |> drop(columns: ["visibility", "status", "unit"])
  |> window(every: 5m)
  |> sum()
  |> duplicate(column: "_stop", as: "_time")
  |> window(every: inf)
  |> yield()

from(bucket: "stat-prod")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "stat")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["unit"] == "review")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["status"] == "ready")
  |> drop(columns: ["type", "visibility", "status"])
  |> window(every: 30m)
  |> sum()
  |> duplicate(column: "_stop", as: "_time")
  |> window(every: inf)
  |> yield(name: "review")

from(bucket: "stat-prod")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "stat")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["unit"] == "complaint")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "review")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "count")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 30m, fn: last, createEmpty: true)
  |> yield(name: "last")

panels.title: [Ratio] Total to active accepted follow request
